title: Deepfake Audio Detection System
description: Graduation Project - Built Flutter mobile app and React web app for deepfake audio detection using Clean Architecture and Dependency Injection. Implemented speech-to-speech functionality with file upload/record and integrated ML models via REST APIs.

title: Muslim Prayer App
description: Comprehensive Islamic app with Quran reading, Hadith collection, and real-time prayer times. Features multi-language support and integrates multiple REST APIs for accurate Islamic content and prayer timings.

title: Chatbot App
description: AI-powered chatbot application built with Flutter and Firebase Authentication. Implements Clean Architecture pattern with REST API integration for intelligent conversation capabilities.

title: Haram Filter App
description: Currently developing an ML-based Flutter application for filtering inappropriate images and videos. Features secure Firebase authentication and advanced machine learning algorithms for content moderation.

title: Google Gemini API Competition Project
description: Participated in Google Gemini API competition, contributing to frontend UI/UX development and building interactive user workflows. Focused on creating intuitive interfaces for AI-powered applications.
